entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
